model.name: Hunyuan Video Custom Audio 720p 13B
model.description: The Hunyuan Video Custom Audio model can be used to generate scenes of a person speaking given a Reference Image and a Recorded Voice or Song. The reference image is not a start image and therefore one can represent the person in a different context.The video length can be anything up to 10s. It is also quite good to generate no sound Video based on a person.
